text: 13|6|(napiye!) Nanmai varuvatarku munnatakave tinkai varavaittukkolla ivarkal um'mitam avacarappatukinranar. Ittakaiya pala visayankal ivarkalukku munnarum niccayamaka nikalnte irukkinrana. Niccayamaka umatu iraivan manitarkalin kurrankalai mannippavanaka irunta potilum, niccayamaka umatu iraivan vetanai ceyvatilum mikak katumaiyanavan avan
